result:
@import '~@theme/styles/config.styl'

.nav-mobile
  position: relative

  &__title
    display: block
    font-weight: bold
    font-size: 18px
    padding-top: 20px
    text-align: center
    text-transform: uppercase
    color: lighten($primaryColor, 30%)

  &__list
    padding: 30px 0
    display: flex
    flex-wrap: wrap

  &__item
    padding-right: 5px
    margin-bottom: 10px

    @media (max-width: $mobile)
      width: 50%
  
  &__link
    padding: 12px
    display: block
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .8)
    font-weight: bold
    border-radius: 10px
    font-size: $smallText
    text-transform: uppercase
    display: flex

    .bullet
      width: 6px
      height: 6px
      top: 5px
      margin-right: 8px

    &:hover
      color: $primaryColor
      background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .8)
